flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this project you will learn how to make an Homemade Terrarium out of an old aquarium, CPU Fan, aquarium heater, a few rocks and cardboard.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this project you will learn how to make an Homemade Terrarium out of an old aquarium, CPU Fan, aquarium heater, a few rocks and cardboard.

Relevant parts
  • 12V computer fan, 2 9V battery clips, 2 9V battery switch, wire, cardboard and fly net for windows
Tools
  • hot glue gun, soldering iron, solder, and adapter

parts.text: 12V computer fan, 2 9V battery clips, 2 9V battery switch, wire, cardboard and fly net for windows

lines.text: Make housing out of cardboard for computer fan, switch and battery.
lines.text_raw: Make housing out of cardboard for computer fan, switch and battery.

lines.text: Make AC and DC voltage if there is no  power for DC voltage.
lines.text_raw: Make AC and DC voltage if there is no  power for DC voltage.

lines.text: Put fly net for windows on the top of terrarium (only if it is a insect) and glue it with hot glue.
lines.text_raw: Put fly net for windows on the top of terrarium (only if it is a insect) and glue it with hot glue.

lines.text: Put 0,5 inch of soil or sand.
lines.text_raw: Put 0,5 inch of soil or sand.

lines.text: Make one cave out of rocks
lines.text_raw: Make one cave out of rocks

lines.text: On the end put somewhere aquarium heater.
lines.text_raw: On the end put somewhere aquarium heater.

lines.text: Then put your insect or reptile.
lines.text_raw: Then put your insect or reptile.

guide.summary:
This project will help you to get some skills about pets.
In this project you will learn how to take care about insects and reptiles.
guide.title: Homemade Terrarium

tools.text: hot glue gun, soldering iron, solder, and adapter
